org.dsa.iot.dslink.node

Class SubscriptionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dsa.iot.dslink.node.SubscriptionManager

  • public class SubscriptionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles subscriptions for values and paths.

    • Method Detail

      • disconnected

        public void disconnected()

      • hasValueSub

        public boolean hasValueSub(Node node)
        Tests whether the node has a value subscription that a remote endpoint is listening to.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to test.
        Returns:
        Whether the node has a value subscription.

      • hasPathSub

        public boolean hasPathSub(Node node)
        Tests whether the node has a path subscription that a remote endpoint is listening to.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to test.
        Returns:
        Whether the node has a path subscription.

      • addValueSub

        public void addValueSub(java.lang.String path,
                        int sid,
                        int qos)
        Adds a value subscription to the designated node. This will allow a node to publish a value update and have it updated to the remote endpoint if it is subscribed.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to subscribe to.
        sid - Subscription ID to send back to the client.
        qos - The QoS level of the designated subscription.

      • removeValueSub

        public void removeValueSub(int sid)
        Removes a value subscription from the designated node. The remote endpoint will no longer receive updates when the value updates.
        Parameters:
        sid - Subscription ID to unsubscribe

      • removeValueSub

        public void removeValueSub(Node node)
        Removes a value subscription from the designated node. The remote endpoint will no longer receive updates when the value updates.
        Parameters:
        node - Subscribed node to unsubscribe

      • addPathSub

        public void addPathSub(java.lang.String path,
                       ListResponse resp)
        Adds a path subscription to the designated node. This will allow a node to publish a child update and have it updated to the remote endpoint if it is subscribed.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to subscribe to
        resp - Response to send updates to

      • removePathSub

        public void removePathSub(Node node)
        Removes the node from being listened to for children updates.
        Parameters:
        node - Node to unsubscribe to.

      • postChildUpdate

        public void postChildUpdate(Node child,
                            boolean removed)
        Posts a child update to notify all remote endpoints of an update.
        Parameters:
        child - Updated child.
        removed - Whether the child was removed or not.

      • batchValueUpdate

        public void batchValueUpdate(java.util.Map<Node,Value> updates)

      • batchValueUpdate

        public void batchValueUpdate(java.util.Map<Node,Value> updates,
                             boolean set)

      • postValueUpdate

        public void postValueUpdate(Node node)
        Posts a value update to notify all the remote endpoints of a node value update.
        Parameters:
        node - Updated node.

      • postMetaUpdate

        public void postMetaUpdate(Node node,
                           java.lang.String name,
                           Value value)
        Updates the internal data of a node such as a configuration or an attribute.
        Parameters:
        node - Updated node.
        name - The name of what is being updated.
        value - The new value of the update.
